details.description: This script uses Slurm to manage the execution of various R scripts and shell scripts. It takes two arguments from the user: a project name and a username. The script then creates a directory for the project and loads the R/4.1.0-gnu9.1 module. It submits a series of jobs to the Slurm queue, each of which runs a different R script. The script then waits for all of the jobs to finish before running a final R script, Trust4Analysis.R.
